mapper.insert: insert into tb_org ( name, parent_id, org_ids, level_type, contact_phone, email, city_id, is_allow, valid, status, utime, ctime ) values ( #{name}, #{parentId}, #{orgIds}, #{levelType}, #{contactPhone}, #{email}, #{cityId}, #{isAllow}, #{valid}, #{status}, #{utime}, #{ctime} )
mapper.update: update tb_org set name = #{name}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, email = #{email}, is_allow = #{isAllow}, valid = #{valid}, status = #{status}, utime = #{utime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select org.id, org.name, org.parent_id parentId, org.level_type levelType, org.contact_phone contactPhone, org.email, org.city_id cityId, org.is_allow isAllow, org.valid, org.status, org.utime, org.ctime from tb_org org where org.parent_id = #{id}

select org.id id, org.parent_id parentId, org.org_ids orgIds, org.name name, org.level_type levelType, org.contact_phone contactPhone, org.email email, org.city_id cityId, org.is_allow isAllow, org.valid valid, org.status status, org.utime utime, org.ctime ctime from tb_org org where org.id = #{id}
